function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Sharing ventilators between 2 patients increases the risk of cross-contamination and spread of contagious diseases.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of improvised breathing aids and devices, such as snood-type masks, without proper filtration and purification systems may lead to inadequate protection against airborne viruses.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Development of makeshift ventilation solutions using off-the-shelf components and 3d printing techniques may pose risks related to device safety, reliability, and function.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of antigen tests with lower sensitivity","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased demand for ventilators","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of manual resuscitators for ventilator automation","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Virus mutation in target region may lead to undetected covid-19 in rapid diagnostic tests.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Improperly collected, transported, or handled specimens may result in false-negative results in covid-19 tests.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High risk of false-negative results in self-collected at-home covid-19 test kits due to improper sample collection.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Delays in covid-19 test results","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reduced performance due to virus transport medium","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate testing volume","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of adequate ventilation in home isolation spaces can lead to increased risk of virus spread within the household.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Sharing of communal spaces, such as toilets, in households where individuals are advised to isolate at home can increase the risk of virus transmission among family members.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate protective equipment for health care workers can increase the risk of infection while interacting with covid-19 patients.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Safety concerns with reusable masks and shields due to lack of medical testing and airtightness","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential incorrect translation and prolonged translation time with speech-transcribing face masks","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Noise and size concerns with personal air-purifying shields","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Potential inconvenience and expense of daily mask cleaning and filter replacement","category":"Society","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"High cost and unavailability of airpop masks for android users","category":"Society","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Conceptual nature of yanko design’s smart display face shield","category":"Society","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Lack of clinical effectiveness measurement for face masks","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inconvenience and noise of purifying shield","category":"Society","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Potential hazards posed by fff technology in ppe manufacturing, including lack of head protection, fitting problems, weight problems, reduced disinfection possibility, and other disadvantages.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate fluid barrier and air filtration in non-fda-cleared 3d-printed ppe devices.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Cost-effectiveness of additive manufacturing technologies using fff, up to a certain production volume, may lead to limited availability of ppe.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased production of 3d-printed ppe leading to potential quality control issues and defective equipment","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Global reliance on 3d-printed ppe leading to supply chain vulnerabilities and disruptions","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Rapid production of 3d-printed ppe without adequate sterilization processes","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Exposure to contagious diseases due to handling and use of personal protective equipment ppe","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate testing methods for contagious diseases","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of effective medical treatment for contagious diseases","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of testing kits","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Shortages of ventilators","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Insufficient accessibility to personal protective equipment ppe","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate cleaning and maintenance of built environment contributing to disease transmission","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of awareness and understanding of disease transmission factors in the built environment","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Unknown transmission dynamics of respiratory virus in the built environment","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limitations in academic research on fm interventions for preventing respiratory infections","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Indoor respiratory virus transmission","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of comprehensive fm interventions","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Overlooked health-related building components","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential spread of contagious diseases due to ineffective infection control measures in built environments","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited adoption of it-driven technologies in facility management domain","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Ethical concerns related to capturing occupant information through sensors and cameras","category":"Society","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Limited effectiveness and safety of disinfection robots and uv systems","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Uncertainty in handling laundry and waste disposal in hotels and other public facilities during a pandemic","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of research and guidelines for proper food handling and cleaning practices in preventing foodborne infections","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Insufficient hvac standards for diluting indoor air to prevent airborne pathogen transmission in high-occupancy facilities.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of evidence to assess the acceptability and feasibility of iaq interventions to key stakeholders.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"}]}
